item.title: Essential Go Bonus: Concurrency
item.description:
You guys asked for it and now it’s finally here! I just updated Essential Go with a 5 part bonus series on concurrency in Go.

If you already own Essential Go then you already have the new videos waiting for you in the course. If you haven’t already purchased Essential Go, now is the perfect time. ($15.00 is an absolute steal)
